name: Pratik Rout
summary: Second-year BCA student passionate about web development and AI, with hands-on experience in building full-stack applications. Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and MongoDB. I thrive in collaborative environments where I can apply my problem-solving and coding skills to real-world challenges.

projects.title: Wanderlust April 2025 - June 2025
projects.description: Developed Wanderlust, a full-stack vacation rental platform inspired by Airbnb, allowing users to list, browse, and book properties. Implemented features like user authentication, listing and review management, and RESTful API integration. Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Passport.js.

projects.title: Smart Language Translator June 2025 - July 2025
projects.description: Created a voice-enabled translator app that supports real-time multilingual translation, speech input, and audio playback. Implemented speech recognition, text-to-speech, and language detection, along with features like theme switching and language toggling for accessibility. Technologies: Python, Streamlit, googletrans, gTTS, speech_recognition.

education: St. Thomas’ Church School April 2014 - May 2024
